abstract: The public editor questions the merits of whether publishing anonymous online comments from readers is acceptable in print.
snippet: The public editor questions the merits of whether publishing anonymous online comments from readers is acceptable in print.
lead_paragraph: Under its new editor, Hugo Lindgren, The New York Times Sunday Magazine underwent a nicely-executed redesign last spring. One change, though, troubles me.

headline.main: Real Names, Please, for Sunday Magazine Reply All Feature
